TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TrustNotGrantedException extends System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException

summary.span: 指示应用程序不具有在本地计算机上运行的相应信任级别。

span.span: Indicates that the application does not have the appropriate level of trust to run on the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序提供的客户端计算机上阻止其进行的潜在恶意活动，例如从硬盘中删除数据或访问网络的信任级别。By default, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications are given a level of trust on client computers that prevents them from engaging in potentially malicious activity, such as deleting data from the hard drive or accessing the network. A[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序可以使用权限提升或信任的应用程序部署以请求更高级别的信任：A [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application can use either permission elevation or Trusted Application Deployment to request a higher level of trust: - 权限提升要求用户授予该应用程序更高级别的安全性。Permission elevation asks the user to grant the application a higher level of security. - 受信任的应用程序部署与匹配的数字签名[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序针对本地计算机上受信任的发布服务器的列表。Trusted Application Deployment matches the digital signature of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application against a list of trusted publishers on the local machine. 如果将引发： will be thrown if: - 应用程序使用权限提升，而用户拒绝了请求提升的信任;或The application uses permission elevation and the user denies the request for elevated trust; or 应用程序使用受信任的应用程序部署和用于对应用程序进行签名的数字证书未列出为本地计算机上受信任的发布服务器。如果你具有已将更新部署到应用程序，并且更新使用以前的版本中，多的权限和[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]引发，将不会安装新版本。The application uses Trusted Application Deployment and the digital certificate used to sign the application is not listed as a trusted publisher on the local machine.If you have deployed an update to an application, and the update uses more permissions than the previous version, and [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] throws a , the new version will not install.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用由系统提供的用于描述错误的消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化会考虑当前系统的系统提供描述诸如"DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply"此消息的错误消息的新实例的属性区域性。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply" This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

param.name: message

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

summary.span: 使用指定的描述错误的消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified message that describes the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||`message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。The error message string specified in `message`.|

summary.span: 用序列化数据初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

param.name: innerException

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 参数不为 ，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 块中引发。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
